@paulkrugman Transaction costs on the #Bitcoin network are currently 1 basis point of value transferred on the base Layer 1, and negligible on the Layer 2 and Layer 3 networks. Bitcoin transactions are growing continually more efficient due to technology advances and economies of scale.

@pontus_rendahl The innovation of #Bitcoin is the creation of stable matter/energy in cyberspace. Electricity is hashed to provide security/integrity, not to deliver transactions. We don't need things to move fast on the base layer, we need them to be massive & last forever. L2/L3 provide speed.
